predicate.note: Frames file for 'westernize' based on frame file for 'activate'. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind, whiten.

example.name: westernize
example.text: He meant that [we]-2 should first westernize, then step back [*]-2 to look at tradition.
example.arg: then step back [*]-2 to look at tradition.
